input.sentences: the parade went down the street .
the man drove his tractor in the parade .
the boy posed inside the machine .
the boy posed in the tractor .
the girls sat in the claw .
output.sentences: Today our small town had a parade on Main street.
As in any small town parade a farmer drove a tractor.
Meanwhile I decide to opt for a different kind of photo and took this one of a kid posed inside the claw of the machine.
As I looked back at the parade I was just in time to catch this one of a boy posed on a tractor.
I must've started a trend because when I looked back at the claw I got my best picture as two girls sat ready for a photo.
